name: Rampart Tactics
detailed_description: Get ready for an exciting turn based strategy experience.  Create squads from the eight different character classes and battle against AI opponents in the single player campaign, or challenge other players online via matchmaking.  Customize your warriors with powerful weapon upgrades as you level them up, and equip them with "runes"' that boost their stats and add other buffs.  Watch the epic battles play out in this challenging indie strategy game!
about_the_game: Get ready for an exciting turn based strategy experience.  Create squads from the eight different character classes and battle against AI opponents in the single player campaign, or challenge other players online via matchmaking.  Customize your warriors with powerful weapon upgrades as you level them up, and equip them with "runes"' that boost their stats and add other buffs.  Watch the epic battles play out in this challenging indie strategy game!
short_description: Indie Turnbased Strategy, solo or online.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i3 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3200 MB available space
